An Ontology-Based Deep Learning Approach for Triple Classification with Out-of-Knowledge-Base Entities
Question 2
11
What are the common elements of both KG and KGE 
models?
KGE 
Models
KGs

constraints based on the interactions
between entities and relations

under a common ontology
